nodes.text: The Baran Do was an ancient order of Kel Dor sages that defended the planet Dorin. Due to their well-honed precognitive skills, they were able to warn government officials and conduct early evacuations from lethal storms. Due to their abilities, the Jedi Order often recruited the Baran Do's most powerful Force-sensitives for centuries, eventually leading to the Baran Do's collapse well before the Imperial Era.
